amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds in contravention of the Executive Order regarding Indian Sacred Sites.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill in contravention of the Executive Order regarding Indian Sacred Sites.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A048) offered by Mr. Grijalva.
